sentence.Network_en: It was as the magazine's business manager that he found his true metier.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在担任杂志的业务经理后才发现自己真正的专长。

sentence.Network_en: Don't ask me how to make an omelette; cooking isn't my metier.
sentence.Network_cn: 可别问我怎么摊鸡蛋, 烹饪不是我的专长.

entry.tran: 专长;特长;得心应手的工作
entry.def: Your metier is the type of work that you have a natural talent for and do well.

example.ex: It was as the magazine's business manager that he found his true metier.
example.tran: 他在担任杂志的业务经理后才发现自己真正的专长。

means.word_mean: 1. an asset of special worth or utility;
2. an occupation for which you are especially well suited;

sentences.sentence: "in law he found his true metier"
